name: [J]ustinRPG
description:
I make RPGs for a living at a fantastic AAA studio, but those take too long to make. So here's my simple love letter to Dragon Quest, made in RPG Maker while I was on paternity leave.

Features
  • 3 hour campaign
  • Light RPG with choices and reactivity
  • Turn based combat with dozens of abilities and spells to find
  • Open world, technically
  • Generally just a delightful time

Not expecting anyone will play this, but if you do, I appreciate you.
